name: KANSAS AQUEDUCT COALITION, INC.
description: Explore options for restoring depleted western Kansas aquifers with eastern Kansas water.
sampleDescriptions: Work with the Bureau of Recalation, Army Corps of Engineers and the Kansas delegation in finding options for restoring depleted western Kansas aquifers with water from eastern Kansas.
